3.8.0.0.message: **ldap-auth**: Add WWW-Authenticate headers to all 401 responses.

3.0.0.0.message: Updated the priority for some plugins.: `ldap-auth` changed from `1002` to `1200`
**LDAP Authentication**: Refactored ASN.1 parser using OpenSSL API through FFI.[#8663](https://github.com/Kong/kong/pull/8663)
